fulltext:
Resume 
PERSONAL INFORMATION: 
Full name (Last name, First name): Vo Chi Dung (Mr.) 
Date of birth: 
January 04, 1990 
Address number: 
Mobile phone number: 
Email address: 
SUMMARY: 
A software engineer with 7 years in software development. Working as data engineer using the 
technologies relate to bigdata such Hadoop, Spark, ElasticSearch and NoSQL. Java, Scala and 
Python is my favorite programing language. Develop software on Linux OS and web. Intermediate 
English with strong points about reading and writing skills, Vietnamese mother tongue. 
Expertise includes: 
 
Java, Scala, Python 
 
Eclipse technologies 
 
Statistics & Probability 
 
Docker container (VM technology) 
 
NoSQL (Redis, Hbase, etc), SQL (MySQL, 
Postgres) 
 
Play Framework 
 
Object-oriented methodology 
 
Functional programming 
 
Lambda architecture 
 
Hadoop, Oozie, Zookeeper, Kafka, Hive  
 
ElasticSearch 
 
Apache Spark 
 
Maven, sbt, git 
Resume 
CAREER HISTORY AND EXPERIENCE: 
Dec 2018 –  Apr 2019 
Data Engineer 
FPT Telecom (Bigdata) 
TV Rating Insight 
TV Rating are the audience measurement systems which measures how 
many people are in an audience, usually in relation to television 
viewership. This system help broadcasters and advertisers determine who 
is viewing rather than just how many people are viewing relate to their 
contents 
Responsibilities 
 
Resesearching about television rating such as: KPI of system, 
target for system. 
 
Design architecture system. 
 
Design layout dashboard WEB. 
 
Setup Elasticsearch cluster for storage and processing data. 
 
Crawler data about channel and program of television 
 
Collect data from log system and build pipeline for run realtime 
 
Implement code and deploying application to Hadoop cluster. 
 
Implement code web such as HTML, JavaScript 
 
Play role as Full-Stack in this project, working as product owner.  
Technologies used in projects 
 
Scala 
 
Kafka, Hadoop, Spark 
 
Elastic Search, Redis 
 
Play Framework 
 
Sbt, git 
Achievements: 
 
A dashboard show indices of TV Rating for realtime and hisotory 
 
Has overview about 1 product 
 
Improve more about idea when build 1 product, how to build 1 
product. 
 
Improve more about Hadoop, Spark, ElasticSearch.

Resume 
May 2018 – Nov 2018 
Data Engineer 
FPT Telecom (Bigdata) 
UserProfile 
This system provides a overview about all user using services of company. 
It collect information of all user from many department to a system center 
through a dashboard insight for view, analytic easily. 
Churn Detective 
A dashboard show information about contract churn of company. 
Therefrom help CS team improve service or take case of contract better. 
Responsibilities 
 
Improve existing system. 
 
Build a data warehouse system for storage and analystic centerlize 
 
Setup Elasticsearch cluster for storage and analytics data. 
 
Working with Data Analyst 
 
Implement job for processing data 
Technologies used in projects 
 
Scala, Python 
 
Kafka, Hadoop, Spark 
 
ElasticSearch, Redis, ClickHouse 
 
Play Framework 
 
Sbt, git 
Achievements: 
 
Learning more about ClickHouse. 
 
A Web Dashboard for UserProfile. 
 
Improve more about Hadoop, Spark, ElasticSearch

Resume 
Jun 2017 – Apr 2018 
Data Engineer 
FPT Telecom (Bigdata) 
Cyber Security 
Cyber security is the practice of defending computers, networks and data 
from malicious attacks. In this system, we built the model for analytic and 
detect the black domain or malware/malicious. This system also provide a 
dashboard for overview about traffic DNS.   
Responsibilities 
 
Implement batch job for processing about ½ TB data per day. 
 
Working with data scientists for analytic model. 
 
Crawler data from WEB for collect domain black/white 
 
Build and design dashboard for reporting traffic log DNS. 
 
Play role as leader and data engineer in this project. 
Technologies used in projects 
 
Scala, Python 
 
Kafka, Hadoop, Spark 
 
ElasticSearch, Redis 
 
Play Framework 
 
Sbt, git 
Achievements: 
 
Learning more about DNS and how to work of DNS 
 
A web dashboard insight about log DNS for repoting daily. 
 
Working with data scientist and understand more about some 
algorithm Machine learning.  
 
Improve more knowledge about Hadoop, Spark, ElasticSearch.

Java Developer 
FPT online 
VnExpress Analytic 
This system provides digital publishers with clear audience insights to 
answer questions about how readers are responding to content of 
VnExpress in Real-Time. 
VnExpress Personalization System 
This system can be personalized based on the characteristics (location, 
device, os, articles of VnExpress with topic of each acticle, comments, like) 
of user Vnexpress. 
Responsibilities 
 
Design architecture system. 
 
Setup Hadoop + Spark + MemSQL, Elasticsearch cluster for 
storage and processing data. 
 
Developing code and deploying application to cluster. 
 
Maintain, monitor and optimize hadoop + Spark + MemSql cluster

Resume 
July 2015 – March 2016 
Java Developer 
FPT online 
Data Mining Platform (DMP) 
This is a private project. It will collect raw data from many sources include 
vnexpress.net, ngoisao.net, etc, and then use Hadoop technologies to 
parsing and processing data. Finally, apply the data mining technologies 
on these data to analyzing them. 
Responsibilities 
 
Improve old system to upgrade to new system using Hadoop and 
speed up processing data. 
 
Design architecture system for new system. 
 
Setup Hadoop + HBase cluster for storage and processing data. 
 
Using Spark to speed up processing data replace for map-reduce in 
Hadoop. 
 
Developing code and deploying application to cluster. 
 
Maintain, monitor and optimize hadoop + hbase cluster 
Technologies used in projects 
 
Java 
 
Hadoop, Hbase, Spark 
 
ElasticSearch 
 
Machine Learning 
 
Maven, Git. 
Achievements: 
 
Setup and optimize Hadoop cluster for running stable. 
 
Speed up processing data with Apache Spark on Hadoop. 
 
Improve more knowledge about Hadoop, HBase and Spark.

Resume 
September 2014 – May 2015 
Java Developer 
VERSALOGIES 
LDAS (Log DirectTV Analyze system) 
Using the technologies relative with hadoop such as: oozie, zookeeper, 
Spark, Hbase, HDFS, map-reduce and Elastic Search to building a system 
for analyze log of DirectTV companay. 
Responsibilities 
 
Researching about Docker container to build a virtual cluster for test 
and deploy system 
 
Researching about Elastic Search for index and search logs 
 
Researching about Spark for analyze logs 
 
Researching about hadoop and technologies relative with hadoop 
to build a core system and setup environment for deploy and test 
system 
 
Training docker, git and guiding setup environment to new 
members 
 
Support members about their technologies which they research 
 
Implementing skeleton for core framework 
 
Main developer for design, deploy and implement core search 
system using Elastic Search 
 
Fix bugs and support fix bugs 
Technologies used in projects 
 
Java 
 
Hadoop, Oozie, Zookeeper, Hbase, Hive, Spark 
 
ElasticSearch 
 
Play Framework 
 
Machine Learning

Docker container (Virtual machine technology) 
 
Maven, Git. 
 
MySQL 
Achievements: 
 
Finished core search basic for system. 
 
Finished setup environment for deploy and test system. 
 
Got more knowledge about Java, Git and MySQL, maven. 
 
Got more knowledge about Hadoop, Elasticsearch 
 
Learned more about Oozie, Zookeeper, Hbase, Hive, Spark, 
Play Framwork 
 
Learned more about a new technology such as docker 
container, It help us create a virtual cluster on a machine or 
many machine, It use resource less than Virtual machine such 
as VMWare or Virtual box.

Resume 
Java Developer 
VERSALOGIES 
February 2014 – September 
2014 
OPower 
A system was designed with inspiration from Functional programming 
languages. The core concept behind the Opower pipeline is that each 
individual step in the pipeline operates as a function taking immutable input 
and emitting serializable output. 
Responsibilities 
 
Learning Functional Programming and Spring Framework to 
understand about OPower system. 
 
Researching WAMI and PTR project. 
 
Developing features for BDR project. 
 
Test BDR project (Independent Testing and integration test). 
 
Fix bugs.

Java 
 
Spring Framework 
 
Functional Programming 
 
VPN, Maven, Git, SVN, Vagrant. 
Achievements:

Finished all features for BDR project. 
 
Got more knowledge about Java, Functional Programming and 
Spring Framework. 
 
Got more knowledge about Git, Vagrant. 
 
Got more experience in real project and large project.

June 2013 – February 2014 
Data Analytic 
VERSALOGIES 
CBM 
Condition-based maintenance (CBM) was introduced to try to maintain the 
correct equipment at the right time. This project use machine learning to 
predict state of equipment and machine diagnosis. 
Responsibilities 
 
Learning Machine learning from Coursera. 
 
Learning about Hidden Markov Model. 
 
Research CBM and search some data sample for CBM. 
 
Learning more some tool for analysis such as: R, Octave

R, Octave

Machine Learning

 
Got more knowledge about Statistic and Probability, understand 
more Hidden Markov Model and some algorithm about Statistic 
Probability such as: Normal distribution, Bayesian probability.

Resume 
September 2012 – June 2013 
Java Developer 
VERSALOGIES 
Genie 
A question answering system in Real-Estate domain, let user input natural 
language question and returns a list of satisfied answers with high 
accuracy. 
HRRC 
Human Resource Recruitment System based on question answering 
system, using Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing (GATE), 
semantic web technologies and other Java technologies.  
Responsibilities 
 
Research Aqualog technology and use it for Geine project. 
 
Research PowerAqua and modify it to apply for HRRC project. 
 
Research Ontology and Gate.  
 
Main Developer for query question of QA system (Geine and 
HRRC project).   
 
Main developer to write Jape rule for Gate to analysis natural 
language. 
 
Testing and deploying. 
 
Fix bugs 
Technologies used in projects 
 
Java 
 
Lucene 
 
Semantic Web: Ontology 
 
Natural Language Processing, GATE 
Achievements: 
 
Finished project estimation and technical proposal on time. 
 
Improve Java skill. 
 
Understand more Lucene to improve search speed. 
 
Understand more about Ontology technology. 
 
Natural Language Processing based on rules.

Resume 
May 2012 – September 2012 
Java Developer 
VERSALOGIES 
Lavalamp 
Develop a framework to analyze log data from distributed sources, using 
Hadoop, MapReduce and Lucene technologies.  
Responsibilities 
 
Research Hadoop to processing large data sets with a parallel, 
distributed algorithm on a cluster. (MapReduce) 
 
Deploy Hadoop on a cluster (~12 PC). 
 
Research ElasticSearch to speed up search for Lavalamp. 
 
Research Lucene to for index large data sets. 
 
Test and install LavaLamp on cluster. 
 
Find out error and fix bugs. 
Technologies used in projects 
 
Hadoop 
 
Lucene 
 
ElasticSearch 
 
Eclipse, Java

 
Finished project estimation and technical proposal on time. 
 
Improve Java skill. 
 
Improve Eclipse technologies. 
 
Got knowledge about Hadoop architecture and how to work of 
Hadoop such as MapReduce mechanism. 
 
Got knowledge about Lucene for indexing and search technology 
and advanced analysis/tokenization capabilities. 
 
Got knowledge about ElasticSearch and some search type.

Resume 
Mar 2012 – May 2012 
CUDA Developer 
VERSALOGIES 
NSMP 
Develop GPGPU-based version of simple Fortran computing software 
to solve Navier-Stokes equation for 2 phases, fluid and solid. This 
software is used to simulate sediment transport and geomorphological 
evolution of Rivers in Vietnam. 
Responsibilities 
 
Port Fortran language to C language, then apply CUDA for 
NSMP. 
 
Optimize algorithm of NSMP to achieve better speedup 
 
Testing and profile program. 
 
Fix bugs. 
Technologies used in projects 
 
GPGPU, CUDA 
 
Fortran 
 
C. 
Achievements: 
 
Finished project estimation and technical proposal on time. 
 
Speedup about 20x compare with original program. 
 
Got more knowledge about High Performance Computing using 
GPGPU – CUDA. Fortran. 
 
Improve CUDA, C. 
Page 13 of 16 
Resume 
July 2011 – September 2011 
Internship C++ Developer 
Gameloft 
3D game Programming on Android platform 
Develop Seahorses 3D game use C++ language with OpenGL 
technology, and then code will be compiled by ndk android to native 
classes which can be called from Java code. 
Responsibilities 
 
Thinking about idea and content for 3D game.  
 
Develop game in C++ language use Visual Studio 2008 
Express. 
 
Research OpenGL to apply it to game. 
 
Research more about some technologies to apply to game such 
as: particle technology, double buffer, ...  
 
Fix bugs and testing. 
Technologies used in projects 
 
OpenGL, Particle, double buffer, effect and shadow, render 
model, ogg sound.    
 
Port from C++ code to native classes can be called from Java 
code: NDK Android 
 
Visual studio, Cygwin, TortoiseSVN 
 
C++, Java, make file, batch script, GCC, Android platform. 
Achievements: 
 
Finished project estimation and technical proposal on time (3 
weeks for training, 1 week for thinking about idea and content of 
game, 1 month to finished game) 
 
Certificate of Completion. 
 
Scholarship Award for best performance. 
 
Improve C++ Code. Understood more C/C++ compile, workflow 
C program from C native to produce execute file. Improve more 
SVN. 
 
Improve Java skill. 
 
Got knowledge about NDK Android to compile C code to native 
classes which used in Java code, OpenGL for rendering 2D and 
3D computer graphics. Unix-like environment and command-
line interface for Microsoft Windows (Cygwin), make file for C 
language. Ogg sound. 
 
Understood more about android platform.
